column4: okay, after 8 monhs in ubuntu, I think I am going back to windows... may try linux again in 2008.
why ya going back to win?

part of it, is that I am working at home, and the work stuff is in windows, the other part, is after today, I've spent vastly more time getting things to work, than I spent the rest of my lifetime in windows.
I don't knock it too much, I have a few clients I switched to it.. it just doesn't suit my needs..
